meanings.definition: A person who supervises others, especially workers.
meanings.sent1: The overseers at the factory make sure everyone is doing their job correctly.
meanings.sent2: The overseers were responsible for ensuring that the workers followed safety regulations.
meanings.sent3: The overseers organized a fun team-building activity for the employees.
meanings.sent4: The overseers were like the captains of a ship, guiding the crew through rough waters.
meanings.sent5: The overseers were like the shepherds of the workplace, keeping everyone in line.

meanings.definition: To watch over and direct the work of others.
meanings.sent1: The manager oversees the team to ensure the project is completed on time.
meanings.sent2: She oversees the production process to guarantee quality control.
meanings.sent3: The teacher oversees the students during the science experiment.
meanings.sent4: The coach oversees the players' training sessions to improve their skills.
meanings.sent5: The supervisor oversees the construction site to prevent any accidents.
